pr_title: [2.19.x] DDF-UI-409 Unable to create new List with filter

timeline.message: DDF-UI-409 Unable to create new List with filter
DDF-UI-409 list.cql deprecated in favor of list.filters

timeline.bodyText: ✏️ I think we should add a comment above LIST_CQL on line 31 to explain how it is being deprecated in favor of list.filters and should now be considered read-only
timeline.author: mojogitoverhere
